content.question: The analogies presented in line 59 (“like a machine-top”) and in lines 60-61 (“as the cat plays with her kittens”) serve to

choices.label: make a distinction between the kinds of games that children play and those that adults play
exemplify a difference between how people typically treat children and how they should strive to treat children
set up a paradox to cause readers to question what they know about interacting with children
illustrate the unintended consequences of a particular approach to child rearing

content.answer: exemplify a difference between how people typically treat children and how they should strive to treat children
